name: simple
effect: Each stage of this Pokémon's stat modifiers acts as two stages. These doubled stages are still limited to a minimum of -6 and a maximum of 6. This Pokémon can still accumulate less than -3 or more than 3 stages of stat modifiers, even though the extra ones have no effect after doubling.
short_effect: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers. These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.
flavor_text.platinum: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.
